<script>
function logout() {
    localStorage.removeItem('gcb:api_key');
    location.reload();
}
</script>
<script src="/$$space/.files/lib/angular-1.2.0/angular.min.js"></script>
<div ng-app="cloudscalers">
<div class="subnavbar" ng-controller="CloudSpaceNavigatorController">

    <div class="subnavbar-inner">
        <div class="container">
            <a class="brand" href="../$$space">CloudScalers</a>
            <ul class="pull-right">
                <li><a href="#">user@user.com</a> </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/Settings">
                        <i class="icon-cog"></i>
                        <span>Settings</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a onclick="logout()" href="." >
                        <i class="icon-lock"></i>
                        <span>Logout</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div class="subnavbar-inner">
        <div class="container">
            <a class="brand" href="../$$space"> <i class="icon-home"></i></a>
            <button class="btn cloudspaceCollapse" ng-click="isCollapsed = !isCollapsed">Toggle collapse <span class="caret"></span></button>
            <div collapse="isCollapsed">
                <accordion close-others="false">
                    <accordion-group heading="Static Header">This content is straight in the template.</accordion-group>
                    <accordion-group heading="{{group.title}}" ng-repeat="group in groups">{{group.content}}</accordion-group>
                    <accordion-group heading="Dynamic Body Content">
                        <p>The body of the accordion group grows to fit the contents</p>
                        <button class="btn btn-small" ng-click="addItem()">Add Item</button>
                        <div ng-repeat="item in items">{{item}}</div>
                    </accordion-group>
                    <accordion-group>
                        <accordion-heading>I can have markup, too!</accordion-heading>
                        This is just some content to illustrate fancy headings.
                    </accordion-group>
                </accordion>
            </div>
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/MachineBuckets"> <i class="icon-cloud"></i>
                        <span>Machine Buckets</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="../$$space/DesktopBuckets"> <i class="icon-desktop"></i>
                        <span>Desktop Buckets</span>
                    </a>
                </li>

                        <i class="icon-ambulance"></i>
                        <span>Docs</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
    

</div>
